title: things wrong with the new client
body: first about the training mode; it is just for new players i thought that you would be able to train champs that you wanted to get better at and game mechanics but it is not like that. in custom games you can not have bots yet . you can not watch friends play games. you can not copy and paste what is said in team select how bout you fix these things so that we can enjoy our games plz

replies.body: Hey dude, bots and friend spectate are scheduled for 7.1, so they'll be in soon
